institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operation rules/Article 35 (period of use of subsidy)
contents: Article 35 (Timing of Subsidy Use) ① The project group shall execute the subsidy in accordance with the approved business plan, but shall not engage in any act causing expenditure exceeding 50/100 of the subsidy amount for the relevant year in December of the relevant year without any special reasons. ② The business group must complete the execution of the support fund for the project in which the activity causing the expenditure occurred before the accounting for the support fund for the relevant fiscal year is completed.
